overview: Annie has escaped to Finland from Congo and is facing both her past and future in a first aid class. But tying a bandage can't fix the wounds caused by war, and it even seems absurd mirrored to the horrors of her past. Giving and receiving help, however, is the ultimate bond between human beings, and gives Annie faith for the future. The help Annie receives will move on to others too. Bandage is a short documentary film about the importance and difficulty of giving help.
tagline: A short film of touch and encounters
title: Bandage
